LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Deaf.label: cut off from magic
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Deaf.description: Carriers of this gene have no magical connection to the ambient mana. They cannot be affected by magical influence, nor can they ever hope to become a mage.
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Dull.label: magically dull
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Dull.description: Carriers of this gene are less magically-adept than others.
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Enhanced.label: magically-sensitive
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Enhanced.description: Carriers of this gene are more magically-adept than average.
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Extreme.label: super magically-sensitive
LanguageData.PsychicAbility_Extreme.description: Carriers of this gene are much more magically-adept than most.
